name: loopingo Monetise Plugin
author: loopingo GmbH

sections.description:
Create added value for your customers while earning additional profits.
With loopingo Monetise you offer your customers exclusive vouchers after the purchase.

Your customers are looking forward to relevant offers from our network – and you earn with loopingo.

What it does?

The loopingo Plugin adds the code to the thank you page on WooCommerce and creates a settings page, where it can be switched on/off as well as switched between live and test mode. Additionally the Token can also easily be added.

Features

  • Add settings page to make loopingo easy to install
  • Automatically add the code to the Thank You page

System Requirements

  • PHP >=5.6
  • WordPress >=4.6

Contribute

  • Anyone is welcome to contribute to the plugin

Author

  • loopingo GmbH https://www.loopingo.com/
  • Simplify Everything OG was the original developer
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • Updated features
  • Compatibility update

1.1.1

  • Fixed bugs
  • Made fit for WordPress 5.4

1.1.0

  • Added location settings for code

1.0.1

  • Fixed bugs
  • Added German language

1.0.0

  • First major release
  • Fixed bugs

0.0.1

  • First release

short_description: Add loopingo onto the thank you page of WooCommerce to show relevant incentives for your customers.
